results.name: Image of 0 under repeated application of the morphism 0 -> 0,1,0, 1 -> 1,1,1.
comment: A word that is pure uniform morphic and recurrent, but not primitive morphic.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..19682
Jean-Paul Allouche, Julien Cassaigne, Jeffrey Shallit, Luca Q. Zamboni, A Taxonomy of Morphic Sequences, arXiv preprint arXiv:1711.10807 [cs.FL], Nov 29 2017.
Index entries for sequences that are fixed points of mappings
program: (PARI) A316829(n) = { while(n, if(n%3==1, return(1), n\=3)); (0); }; \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 27 2019
